remarks: Associativity of extended real addition.  The correct condition here is "it is not the case that both ` +oo ` and ` -oo ` appear as one of ` A , B , C ` , i.e. ` -. { +oo , -oo } C_ { A , B , C } ` ", but this condition is difficult to work with, so we break the theorem into two parts: this one, where ` -oo ` is not present in ` A , B , C ` , and ~ xaddass2 , where ` +oo ` is not present.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Aug-2015.)
statement: xaddass $p |- ( ( ( A e. RR* /\ A =/= -oo ) /\ ( B e. RR* /\ B =/= -oo ) /\ ( C e. RR* /\ C =/= -oo ) ) -> ( ( A +e B ) +e C ) = ( A +e ( B +e C ) ) ) $.
